arrow-down.description: Used to indicate direction (down) of a follow up action in UI elements.

arrow-left.description: Used to indicate direction (left) of a follow up action in UI elements.

arrow-right.description: Used to indicate direction (right) of a follow up action in UI elements.

arrow-up.description: Used to indicate direction (up) of a follow up action in UI elements.

chevron-down.description: Used to indicate direction (down) of a follow up action in UI elements.

chevron-left.description: Used to indicate direction (left) of a follow up action in UI elements.

chevron-right.description: Used to indicate direction (right) of a follow up action in UI elements.

chevron-up.description: Used to indicate direction (up) of a follow up action in UI elements.

cross.description: Used to indicate a dismiss action.

cross-circle-solid.description: Used to indicate a dismiss action.

placeholder.description: Placeholder for when an icon is missing.
